text: Hello there, Friends. My question might be considered naive but I am really trying to make first and second and third steps in HubSpot world. I am currently trying to get certification from HubSpot Academy and I got stuck on practicum excersise. Essentially what I am battling against is creating repeatable group of Photos - each has a small bar underneath with name and position. It should be responsive with 1 Photo on Mobile, 2 on Tablets and 4 on Desktop. Sadly, despite uploading the photos into HubSpot, I cannot make it into fully working repeatable group. What I am doing wrong? Firstly, it seems I cannot have 1 photo and bar with text within one Div, because it extends to below (see the screenshot below).
Here is how it looks like

Secondly - My changes are not being saved. I need to upload the photos and change names every time i open this module. I am aware these are rookie questions, but in order to stop being a rookie, I am seeking your help
Hello, I would appreciate the help. Im trying to change the button height?
